stat.Name: _Version

stat.Comment: Subscription level for player

stat.Name: _AutoLoginEnabled
stat.Comment: If the player is online when the title screen is reached; this should be set to 1. Otherwise; should be 0.

stat.Name: _DisplayMode
stat.Comment: The vertical resolution last played in (e.g. 480; 720; 900; 1080; etc).

stat.Name: _Gamma

stat.Name: _InvertedAim
stat.Comment: If player is using inverted aiming; set to 1. Otherwise; set to 0.

stat.Name: _MpAvgDownBps

stat.Name: _MpAvgPeerPing

stat.Name: _MpAvgUpBps
stat.Comment: Avg upstream Bytes per second in multiplayer. (0 if N/A)

stat.Name: _NatType

stat.Name: _NumSaveGames

stat.Name: _PublicIp

stat.Name: _ScIsLinked

stat.Comment: If player registered to SC from in-game; set to 1. Otherwise; set to 0.

stat.Name: MS_ARM1_NOSCRATCH
stat.Comment: Mission stat : 'ARM1_NOSCRATCH : Not a scratch (Player repo car takes less than 10% damage during mission)' Target value is: '100' lessThan status is : 'True'

stat.Name: MS_ARM1_SPECIAL_ABILITY_TIME
stat.Comment: Mission stat : 'ARM1_SPECIAL_ABILITY_TIME : The time in milliseconds which the player used their characters special ability on this mission.' Target value is: '7000' lessThan status is : 'False'

stat.Name: MS_ARM1_WINNER
stat.Comment: Mission stat : 'ARM1_WINNER : Did the player win the race between Franklin and Lamar? Set this to true if Franklin was in first place when the car park cutscene started.' Target value is: '1' lessThan status is : 'False'

stat.Name: MS_ARM1_HIT_ALIENS
stat.Comment: Mission stat : 'ARM1_HIT_ALIENS : Did the player drive through the movie studio without hitting any aliens? Call when/if the player hits one to fail them, otherwise pass.' Target value is: '1' lessThan status is : 'True'

stat.Name: MS_ARM2_TIME
stat.Comment: Mission stat : 'ARM2_TIME : Mission Time (Player completes the mission within 6 minutes 30 seconds)' Target value is: '390000' lessThan status is : 'True'

stat.Name: MS_ARM2_PETROL_FIRE
stat.Comment: Mission stat : 'ARM2_PETROL_FIRE : Trail blazer (The player shoots the petrol trail which blows up the car)' Target value is: '1' lessThan status is : 'False'

stat.Name: MS_ARM2_HEADSHOTS
